Name: Argentina
Description: A large country in South America, known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse landscapes, and tango music.

Name: Bolivia
Description: A landlocked country in South America known for its diverse geography, including the Andes mountains and the Salar de Uyuni.

Name: Brazil
Description: The largest country in South America, famous for its football culture, Amazon rainforest, and vibrant cities like Rio de Janeiro.

Name: Chile
Description: A long, narrow country stretching along the western edge of South America, known for its diverse climate and stunning natural beauty.

Name: Colombia
Description: Located in the north of South America, Colombia is known for its coffee, beautiful landscapes, and rich cultural history.

Name: Ecuador
Description: A small country straddling the equator, known for its diverse ecosystems, including the Gal√°pagos Islands and the Andes mountains.

Name: Guyana
Description: A small country on the northeast coast of South America, known for its rainforest and rich history.

Name: Paraguay
Description: A landlocked country in central South America, known for its history and natural resources.

Name: Peru
Description: A country in western South America, famous for its rich ancient culture, including the Inca civilization, and the city of Machu Picchu.

Name: Suriname
Description: A small country on the northeastern coast of South America, known for its tropical rainforests and Dutch colonial architecture.

Name: Uruguay
Description: A small country in the southern part of South America, known for its high quality of life and beautiful beaches.

Name: Venezuela
Description: A country in the northern part of South America, known for its oil reserves, political history, and stunning Angel Falls.
